Module downfall
Package net.dragondelve.util

Class SimpleSaveManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dragondelve.util.SimpleSaveManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SaveManager
    final class SimpleSaveManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements SaveManager
    Simple implementation of save manager that uses the Configurator class to store the LastSavegamePathname. If a savegame is loaded it also tries to find, load and apply the rules that were used when last saving this savegame.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SimpleSaveManager()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void loadFrom​(java.lang.String pathname)
      Loads and applies the savegame from a given pathname and attempts to find, load and validate the rules that are referenced in the savegame.
      void loadFromLast()
      Loads and applies the savegame from last pathname used and attempts to find, load and validate the rules that are referenced in the savegame.
      void saveTo​(java.lang.String pathname)
      Formulates a new Savegame ba
      void saveToLast()
      Formulates a new Savegame based on the state of the Configurator and then saves it to the last pathname used.
